alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 1:39PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Washoe County through 215 PM PDT... At 138 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sutcliffe, or on the western shore of Pyramid Lake, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail, and cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sutcliffe, Pyramid Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
